title: Ikigai - Disrupting Games via NFTs
description: The video game industry market is bigger than the music and film industry combined; however, NFT's have only begun to scratch the surface.
solution: Create a bundle of comprehensive, extensive business models that address both how NFTs improve or disrupt existing business models
